Class Parser

java.lang.Object
com.pega.lpst.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
Useful examples of string parsing for use with your app logic

  • Method Details

    • fromDelimitedText

      public static List<Map<?,?>> fromDelimitedText(@NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> inputMap)
      Convert a string containing delimited values into a List Of Cases for use in app logic
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Should contain a key "text" with a value of delimited string like "a,b,c,d". Optionally can contain key "delim" that specifies the delimiter being used
      Returns:
      Object a List of TreeMap objects, where each map contains a single mapping: a key called "token" and the value of the token

    • fromCsv

      public static List<Map<?,?>> fromCsv(@NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> inputMap)
      Parse a comma-separated-value string into a List of Objects.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Must contain key 'csv' with a value of a csv string.
      Returns:
      Object a List of TreeMap objects, where each map contains a column->value mapping, where the key of the mapping is the column header value.

    • fromJsonObject

      public static Map<?,?> fromJsonObject(@NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> inputMap)
      Deserialize a json string containing a single top-level object into a TreeMap structure. Output of function can be evaluated by a JSON transform to map data into pega object structure.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Must contain key 'json' with a value of a json string.
      Returns:
      Mapinvalid input: '<'?,?> a TreeMap object, where the map contains a key->value mapping. Each map may contain embedded maps.

    • fromJsonArray

      public static List<Map<?,?>> fromJsonArray(@NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> inputMap)
      Deserialize a json string containing a top-level object array into a TreeMap structure. Output of function can be evaluated by a JSON transform to map data into pega object structure.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Must contain key 'json' with a value of a json string.
      Returns:
      Object a List of TreeMap objects, where each map contains a key->value mapping. Each map may contain embedded maps.
